Nagrada za režiju izmakla je Johnu Maddenu, jer je 1999. slavio Steven Spielberg sa "Spašavanjem vojnika Ryana"(c)
programme.category: SAD/Velika Britanija, komična drama, dobitnica 7 Oscara, 1998.

programme.title: Zanimanje špijun
Spy game
programme.desc: U posljednjem radnom danu prije umirovljenja agent CIA-e Nathan Muir (R. Redford) dozna da je njegov štićenik Tom Bishop (B. Pitt) optužen za špijunažu u jednom kineskom zatvoru i da mu prijeti pogubljenje. Godina je 1991. i američki bi predsjednik za nekoliko dana trebao posjetiti Kinu. U sjedištu CIA-e u Langleyu osniva se radna skupina koja u roku od 24 sata mora odlučiti isplati li se više spasiti Bishopa ili ga žrtvovati. Nathan Muir pozvan je da svjedoči o Bishopovu radu i on priča o tome kako je u vijetnamskom ratu upoznao Bishopa, unovačio ga u CIA-u i surađivao s njim u Bejrutu, gdje se mladi agent zaljubio u Elizabeth Hadley (C. McCormack), ženu koja se bavila humanitarnim radom. Dok naizgled surađuje s kolegama, Muir, koji je shvatio da će Bishop biti žrtvovan, pokreće vlastitu akciju spašavanja, u koju ulaže svoju životnu ušteđevinu.

programme.title: Schinlerova lista
Schindler's List
programme.desc: Krakov, Poljska. Oskar Schindler (L. Neeson) pronalazi u Drugom svjetskom ratu savršenu priliku za stjecanje profita. Otvara tvornicu posuđa i zapošljava Židova Itzhaka Sterna (B. Kingsley) kao računovođu, no stravični zločini sunarodnjaka natjeraju ga da promijeni stav prema žrtvama rata. Preobraćeni tvorničar pruža i ostalim radnicima utočište, no kratkotrajnu sigurnost tvornice početkom 1941. prekida otvaranje geta. Dvije godine kasnije geto zamjenjuje okrutna realnost radnog logora, a Schindler dolazi u nemoguć položaj poslovanja s okrutnim upraviteljem logora, pripadnikom SS-a Amonom Göthom (R. Fiennes) Schindlerova lista je potresno svjedočenje o holokaustu. Film je sjajno režiran. Priča o intrigantnom i kompleksnom Nijemcu Oskaru Schindleru izložena je stupnjevitim psihološkim profiliranjem koje je istaklo njegov razvojni put od ratnog profitera do osobe koja je spasila stotine života. Liam Neeson pokazao se savršenim izborom za ulogu snalažljivog tvorničara, a svoju ulogu izvrsno je odglumio i Ralph Fiennes kao SS-ov upravitelj logora Göth. Riječ je o jednom od najimpresivnijih Spielbergovih ostvarenja, iznimno discipliniranom i kvalitetnom filmu koji se može pohvaliti sjajnom crno-bijelom fotografijom snimatelja Janusza Kaminskog (Uhvati me ako možeš, Jerry Maguire) i glazbom slavnog Johna Williamsa (Terminal, JFK). Jedan od producenata filma je i Branko Lustig (Hannibal). Među brojnim Oscarima Schindlerova lista osvojila je Oscare za najbolji film, režiju i glazbu. Neki kritičari smatraju da je film mnogo uspjeliji kao potresan prikaz rata i podsjetnik na grozote holokausta nego kao portret Oskara Schindlera, stvarne povijesne osobe. Nedavno je izašla i knjiga povjesničara Davida M. Crowea, u kojoj on narušava autoritet filmskog Schindlera

programme.title: Oko špijuna
Eye of the beholder
programme.desc: Triler u kojem tajni agent svjedoči ubojstvu koje počini tajanstvena žena, no umjesto da je uhiti, on je počinje opsesivno pratiti. Tajni agent "Eye" /"Oko"/ (Ewan McGregor) dobiva zadatak pratiti rastrošnog sina poznatog političara koji troši velike svote novca na svoju ljubavnicu (Ashley Judd). Naizgled jednostavan zadatak naglo se zakomplicira kad ta djevojka jedne večeri okrutno ubije svoga ljubavnika. Agent je ubojstvo vidio, no nešto ga je spriječilo da uhiti djevojku. On je u prošlosti doživio traumu kad ga je bez objašnjenja napustila žena i odvela kćer. Od tada rijetko komunicira i sa kim, osim s ljudima iz agencije. U ovoj djevojci ima nešto što u njemu budi sjećanja. On je stoga počinje opsesivno pratiti diljem Amerike, pokušavajući shvatiti motive zbog kojih ubija muškarce. Kako vrijeme ide, djevojka ostavlja sve duži trag ubijenih muškaraca iza sebe, no "Oko" se svaki put pobrine da na mjestu zločina ne ostane trag koji bi policiji odao ubojicu. On se više ne javlja svojoj agenciji, a život mu se svodi na ulogu zaštitnika tajanstvene djevojke... Činjenica da je Eye of the Beholder sniman u koprodukciji triju zemalja i još više produkcijskih kuća odmah upućuje na to da ovdje nije riječ o uobičajenoj holivudskoj trilerskoj konfekciji. Književni predložak, istoimeni roman Marca Behma, nudi prilično nekonvencionalnu priču, a redatelj i scenarist Stephan Elliott (Priscilla, kraljica pustinje) odlučio je tu nekonvencionalnost u potpunosti, pa čak i još naglašenije, prenijeti na ekran. Film je stoga i u sadržajnom i u formalnom smislu neobično ostvarenje u kojem prvenstveno do izražaja dolazi Elliottov inventivan stil režiranja, koji rezultira tajnovitom i mračnom atmosferom te potencira depresivno ozračje u kojem se likovi nalaze. Njegovi su kadrovi detaljno postavljeni pa gledatelj čest puno više informacija dobiva slikom nego govorom ili interakcijom likova (koja je u filmu ionako vrlo rijetka). Na to se nadovezuju još dva upadljiva aspekta ovoga filma. Prvi je izvrsna gluma; najviše pohvala tu zaslužuje vodeći par, Ewan McGregor (Trainspotting, Moulin Rouge) i Ashley Judd (Kolekcionar, Vrijeme ubijanja), oboje iznimno talentirani i prilagodljivi glumci, sposobni portretirati raznolike profile likova, ali i Jason Priestley (Brandon iz serije Beverly Hills 90210) koji je vrlo upečatljivo odigrao zanimljivu i s njegovim imidžom gotovo nespojivu ulogu nasilnog provincijalca. Drugi je aspekt scenarij koji prilično šturo objašnjava zbivanja na ekranu i rijetko obrazlaže postupke likova, pa iznoseći razne motive tjera gledatelja da sam izvede zaključke. Radi se, dakle, o filmu koji pruža privlačan vizualni doživljaj, ali isto tako zahtijeva pažljivu suradnju gledatelja kroz čitavo trajanje. Elliottova je režija 2000. godine nagrađena Srebrnim gavranom na Međunarodnom festivalu fantastičnog filma u Bruxellesu

programme.title: Without You I'm Nothing
programme.desc: Bringing Sandra Bernhard's hit one-woman show to the screen, this feature changes scenes with her moods and offers viewers her unique perspectives on life through monologues and music

programme.title: Vicious Lips
programme.desc: When a talented all girl band from outerspace attempts to enter a huge talent contest their road to success is blocked by everything from psycho killers to comets

programme.title: Motel Hell
programme.desc: Veteran actor Rory Calhoun stars as the delightfully fiendish Farmer Vincent in this deliciously ghoulish tale of the macabre that has now become a cult classic

programme.title: It Runs In The Family
programme.desc: It is now summer in the Parker family; and the usual amount of numerous events are happening in their separate lives.(c)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Petorica plaćenika okupljaju se u Parizu zbog krađe tajanstvenog kovčega. Njihova poslodavka Deirdre (N. McElhone) nikako ne želi odati o čemu je riječ, no oprezni Sam (R. De Niro), bivši djelatnik CIA-e, sluti kako zadatak neće biti posve jednostavan. Ostatak ekipe čine Parižanin Vincent (J. Reno), bivši KGB-ov agent Gregor (S. Skarsgård), vozač Larry (S. Sudduth) i stručnjak za oružje Spence (S. Bean). No konce iz pozadine zapravo vuče Deirdrein nadređeni, zloglasni IRA-in vođa, Seamus (J. Pryce), koji vodi ekipu u propast... Ronin je, prema japanskoj legendi, samuraj čiji je gospodar ubijen. Ostavljen bez vođe kojemu bi posvetio život, ronin besciljno luta zemljom i može ga unajmiti tko želi za posao koji želi. Taj se opis može primijeniti na skupinu okorjelih ubojica koji se okupljaju u pariškom bistrou na početku istoimenog filma, špijunsko-akcijskog trilera "Ronin". To je poslastica za ljubitelje filmova potjera, film koji s puno stila priziva u sjećanje glasovitu potjeru iz Friedkinove "Francuske veze". John Frankenheimer režirao je "Ronina" sigurnom rukom, imajući uvijek u vidu preglednost unutar kadrova i atraktivnost akcijskih scena. Kao zanimljivost svakako valja istaknuti kako je scenarij najvećim dijelom napisao slavni dramatičar, redatelj i scenarist David Mamet, no odlukom udruženja scenarista on je u ovome filmu potpisan pseudonimom Richarda Weisza. Za veliki uspjeh filma zaslužna je prvorazredna internacionalna glumačka ekipa. Robert De Niro briljira u ulozi iskusnog plaćenika Sama, a ništa se lošije nije snašao ni Jean Reno, čija uloga u mnogome podsjeća na kultnog "Leona"

programme.title: Lone Runner
programme.desc: Analisa has been kidnapped by a gang of desert thieves. The price of her freedom is the sack of priceless diamonds which her father possesses. Garret, known in the desert as the Lone Runner, is the only one with the skill and prowess to her out alive

programme.title: Without You I'm Nothing
programme.desc: Bringing Sandra Bernhard's hit one-woman show to the screen, this feature changes scenes with her moods and offers viewers her unique perspectives on life through monologues and music

programme.title: KITOVI U KOLOVOZU
The whales of august
programme.desc: Radnja filma „Kitovi u kolovozu“ smještena je na otoku Maineu na kojem su dvije sestre provele preko 60 ljeta. Kao mlade žene u dugim haljinama i velikim šeširima trčale su prema obali da bi gledale kitove kako se igraju i izranjaju na površinu. Bili su to sretni i mirni dani. Ali kitovi su odavno otišli, simbolizirajući na taj način čežnju za životom koji je također nestao. Supruzi sestara umrli su, a Sarah (LILLIAN GISH) i Libby (BETTE DAVIS) vezane su međusobnom ovisnošću koja stalno nateže njihovu krhku ravnotežu. Sarah, romantičarka koja čezne za novim prozorom s pogledom na ocean, ima društvo najbolje prijateljice i susjede Tisha (ANN SOTHERN), a tu su i upitne namjere g. Maranova (VINCENT PRICE), šarmantnoga i sumnjivoga gospodina čije je korijenje u carskoj Rusiji. Obilježje je slijepe i izravne Libby skrušenost povezana s ciničnim humorom, kao i ponos svojom ljepotom koju i dalje predstavlja njezina duga bijela kosa koju Sarah svaki dan češlja. Tu je također i Joshua Brackett (HARRY CAREY JR.), osorni majstor koji se također mora pomiriti s neizbježnom prolaznošću. Film slijedi ove neobične likove na kraju ljeta dok oni prolaze važne emocionalne promjene. Ovo je priča o hrabrosti, ljubavi, smijehu, uspomenama i dostojanstvu starenja. Ili kako bi to Ann Sothern rekla: „Svi mi smo preživjeli i ovaj film je o preživljavanju.“ Film su producirali Carolyn Pfeiffer i Mike Kaplan, režirala ga je Lindsay Anderson. Scenarij je po svojoj drami napisao David Berry. Shep Gordon izvršni je direktor

programme.title: Touched
programme.desc: Two mental institution inmates who escape fall in love and try to live a normal life together in the outside world

programme.title: Road To Hong Kong
The
programme.desc: It's a laugh-along rollercoaster with Bing Crosby and Bob Hope as vaudevillians who search Tibet for a cure for Hope's lost memory and wind up on a rollicking misadventure with a beautiful spy (Joan Collins)

programme.title: Teen Witch
programme.desc: Lui ne spada u najpopularnije osobe u svojoj školi. Iznenada otkriva da je nasledila moći od veštica iz Salema. U početku koristi moći da bi vratila ostalim učenicima za sva zadirkivanja... Ali, ubrzo počinje da razmišlja o tome da li je to ispravan način za korišćenje moći koje poseduje

programme.title: Sin Pink Pantera
Son of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: Dugo posle nestanka slavnog inspektora, na videlo izlazi njegova nekadašnja ljubavna veza sa Marijom Gambleri, devojkom koju je svojevremeno odbranio od optužbi za teško ubistvo. Iz te kratke ljubavi rođen je Žak Gambreli, Kluzoov sin.

programme.title: She Devil
programme.desc: Rut je gojazna i neugledna domaćica koju muž ostavlja zbog lepe književnice Mari Fišer, zbog čega je Rut odlučna u nameri da mu se osveti

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Something's been eating Clay Dwyer. His mom! Once a sweet lovable lady, she's been bitten by and transformed into a flesheater, turning her into a hungry creature with a knack for good old homestyle cooking

programme.title: Električni snovi
(Electric Dreams) (1984)
programme.desc: Majls kupuje najnoviji kompjuter na tržištu, poslednje čudo tehnike. Vremenom Edgar, kompjuter, počinje da ispoljava emocije, stavove... Problemi nastaju kad se i Majls i Edgar zaljubljuju u istu devojku

programme.title: CLIFFORD
Clifford
programme.desc: Koja je razlika između Clifforda i pit bulla? Jedan će vas rasplakati i dovesti do živčanog sloma, preplašiti vaše prijatelje i uništiti kuću, a drugi je pas. Neposlušni i razulareni desetogodišnjak po imenu Clifford (Martin Short) odlazi svome ujaku Martinu (Charles Grodin) na vikend. Nakon što je izazvao incident u zrakoplovu na putu za Havaje, njegov otac Julien (Richard Kind) jedva je dočekao da ga skine s vrata i pošalje nekom drugom na brigu. Ispostavlja se da Clifford žarko želi posjetiti "Dinosaur World", zabavni tematski park o izumrlim prahistorijskim životinjama u blizini ujakove kuće. Na putu između njega i udovoljavanja njegovoj želji stoji gomila uništenih i razbijenih stvari, od čega će se mnogima dizati kosa na glavi. Ujak ima još jedan problem, zaručnicu (Mary Steenburgen) koja silno želi djecu, a Martin joj mora dokazati da je spreman brinuti se za pomladak. Clliford mu je nezgodan uzorak. Mnogi će film o dogodovštinama maloga Clifforda, nakon što ga pogledaju, s pravom nazvati crnom komedijom. U početku se čini da je riječ samo o još jednom filmu sa zločestim malim derištima u glavnoj ulozi koji roditeljima ne daju mira. Clifford će gledatelje brzo uvjeriti da se u njegovoj bogatoj zalihi nepodopština kriju mnoge neiskorištene komične filmske situacije. Komične za gledatelje, a bolne za sve one koje nervira nepodnošljivi Clifford

programme.title: Trideset godina sna
Late for dinner
programme.desc: Scenarist Mark Andrus i redatelj W.D. Richer dugo nas pripremaju za malu šalu. Nakon svađe s okrutnim trgovcem nekretninama (Peter Gallagher) koji želi njegovu kuću, Willie (Brian Wimmer), oženjeni mljekar iz Santa Fea bježi u L. A. s Frankom (Peter Berg), svojim retardiranim šogorom. Sklonivši se u znanstveni laboratorij koji vodi dr. Chilblains (Bo Brundin), ostanu potpuno zamrznuti. Godina je 1962., no kada dečke iznesu van, prošlo je neko vrijeme – nalaze se u 1991. g. Iako Willie i Frank izgledaju jednako, svijet oko njih više ne izgleda

programme.title: Crveni ugao
Red Corner
programme.desc: Hičkokovski triler o Amerikancu koji je na službenom putu u Pekingu optužen za ubojstvo koje nije počinio. Američki pravnik Jack Moore stigao je u Kinu kako bi Kinezima prodao prava za prikazivanje američkih kabelskih i satelitskih televizijskih programa. U pekinškom noćnom lokalu upozna lijepu Kineskinju koja pokuša nacrtati njegov portret. Odu u hotel gdje provedu noć. U rano jutro u sobu upadne policija i vrlo grubo probudi Moorea. On je sav krvav, a Kineskinja je umorena ubodima noža. Odmah ga uhite i optuže za umorstvo koje nije počinio. Kazna je za takav zločin smrt. Po kineskim zakonima ne može ga braniti američki odvjetnik nego samo kineski kojeg odredi nadležno ministarstvo. Kolega Bob Ghery obrati se odmah američkom veleposlanstvu, no konzul Ed Pratt kaže da mu zapravo ne mogu mnogo pomoći. Ipak, nabave mu engleski prijevod kineskog zakona. Kineske vlasti odrede da ga brani mlada i lijepa odvjetnica Shen Yuelin. Moore najprije mora nju uvjeriti da je nevin.

programme.title: UTJEHA U NARUČJU NEZNANACA
The comfort of strangers
programme.desc: U ovom erotskom trileru mladi engleski par na odmoru u Veneciji zavede tajnoviti stariji par. Mary (Natasha Richardson) i Colin (Rupert Everett) došli su u Italiju da bi procijenili budućnost svoje problematične veze. Uskoro upoznaju Roberta (Christopher Walken), enigmatičnog vlasnika seoskoga kupališta. On ih zabavlja bogatim vinom i slikovitim pričama iz svoga djetinjstva koje je proveo s brutalnim i dominantnim ocem. Poslije pijani i izgubljeni u gradu nalik labirintu ponovno susreću Roberta koji ih dovede u svoju prekrasnu vilu. Također upoznaju njegovu ženu Caroline (Helen Mirren) koja pati od razornih bolova u leđima i očitoj mentalnoj nestabilnosti. Colin i Mary fascinirani su glamuroznim starijim parom, ali im smeta njihova nefunkcionalnost. Unatoč tomu, polako bivaju uvučeni u seksualne i emocionalne igrice koje kulminiraju u iznenadnom nasilju. Paul Schrader režirao je film „Utjeha u naručju neznananca“, a Harold Pinter adaptirao je roman Iana McEwana. Richardson je prije glumila u filmu „Patty Hearst“, Schraderovu portretu nasljednice novinskog carstva koja je postala terorist

programme.title: Phobia
programme.desc: An intense psychological drama about a loveless couple who use each other's fears against one another, each trying to master the other as the agoraphobic (fear of going outside) wife tries to leave the failed marriage

programme.title: Tajna afera
Waking up in Reno
programme.desc: Upoznajte Roya (P. Swayze) i Candy (C. Theron) te Lonnie Earla (B.B. Thornton) i Darlene (N. Richardson), dva mlada bračna para koji misle kako se dobro poznaju sve dok ne odluče zajedno otići na izlet iz svojih snova. Kreću na put u posve novom nakrcanom sportskom vozila i zabavljaju se kao nikada u životu. Sve dok se ne dogodi nešto neobično na putu do spektakularnih utrka tegljača u Reno-u, Nevada. Čini se da je Lonnie Earl zaljubljen u Candy, a kada istina izbije na vidjelo, ovaj zabavni izlet doseže svoj vrhunac

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monka i Natalie posjećuje stari Mitchev prijatelj, mornarički poručnik Steven Albright. Njegov prijatelj Jason Pierce počinio je samoubojstvo, no Albright sumnja na ubojstvo pa želi da Monk provede istragu. Monk pristane, no iznenadi se kad vidi da je mjesto navodnog zločina podmornica. Albright objašnjava okolnosti Pierceove smrti, no u želji da što prije izađe iz podmornice Monk prihvaća službenu ocjenu da je riječ o samoubojstvu. Nedugo zatim oglasi se alarm i podmornica zaroni pod vodu. Glavni zapovjednik, kapetan fregate Nathan Whitaker, ljutit je kad dozna da su Monk i Natalie u njegovoj podmornici te im zabranjuje da mu smetaju. Kako bi svladao stres od zatočenosti i tijesnog prostora, Monk zamišlja da je dr. Bell s njim. Imaginarni dr. Bell savjetuje mu da se pozabavi istragom Pierceove smrti

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake duguje mafijaškom šefu i uvjere ga da poravna račune istražujući prevaranta. Leslie nije oduševljena kad u posjet dođe Jakeova bivša

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Kevin Crocker vraća se u grad s odlukom da osvjetla obraz - uz Jakeovu pomoć. Des se bori s tajnom. Sve su oči uprte u Leslie

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jakea uzimaju za taoca i prinude ga da istražuje opasno razbojstvo iznutra. Rose i Desu postaje sumnjivo Sloanino tajnovito ponašanje

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Leslie se udružuje s Callumom kako bi pronikla u ubojstvo doušnika. Tinny je pod pritiskom kad radi na važnom slučaju(c)

programme.title: Umorstva u Midsomeru
Midsomer murders
programme.desc: Barnaby istražuje kad tijekom mađioničarske predstave vlasnicu puba zdrobi golema plastična kutija

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
Hawaii five-0

programme.title: Thor: Božji malj
Thor: Hammer of the Gods
programme.desc: Mladi Thor i njegovi prijatelji odlaze na zagonetni otok u potrazi za slavom u ovoj priči o podrijetlu junaka s čekićem

programme.title: Luda kuća
Duplex
programme.desc: Alex Rose (Stiller) i Nancy Kendricks (Barrymore) mladi su i uspješni par iz New Yorka koji traže svoj stan iz snova. Kada ga napokon nađu, sve je savršeno osim jedne stvari: gđe Connelly (Eileen Essel), mrzovoljne starice koja živi na zadnjem katu. Uzimajući u obzir da je stara i bolesna, Alex i Nancy kupe stan... i požale. Gđa Connelly je, naime, puna energije i neprestano stvara buku. Alex pokušava završiti roman no tisuću prohtjeva gđe Connelly u tome ga sprječavaju. Kada Nancy izgubi posao, i oni završe u stanu sa staricom, počnu kovati plan kako je se riješiti.

programme.title: Kći mog šefa
My Boss's Daughter
programme.desc: Tom (Ashton Kutcher) radi u izdavačkoj kući. Želi napredovati, no zbog zahtjevnog šefa Jacka Taylora izgubi živce nakon samo pet minuta provedenih s njim. Osim toga, sviđa mu se njegova kći Lisa (Tara Reid), koju također kontrolira otac. Kada se ona povjeri Tomu da joj otac ne dopušta ići na zabavu, on joj kaže da bi mu se trebala suprotstaviti. Ona kaže da hoće te ga pozove u obiteljsku kuću. Tom misli da joj se sviđa, no ona samo želi da on bude kod kuće dok je ona na zabavi. On nevoljko pristane. No kada se pojave Taylorov razmetni sin Red i tajnica koju je otpustio, stvari se počinju razjašnjavati. U međuvremenu se pojave još neki ljudi. Kada Lisa dođe kući, sazna što Tom osjeća prema njoj, no ne vjeruje u njegovu iskrenost

programme.title: Američka pita: Knjiga ljubavi
American Pie: The Book of Love
programme.desc: Uz pomoć knjige skrivene u školskoj knjižnici tri dečka pokušavaju izgubiti nevinost - no knjiga se ošteti i njezini savjeti postaju dvojbeni

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake naiđe na zagonetku ubojstva dok je u ribolovu s Desom i Malom. Sloan prelazi granicu. Des skiva tajnu od Doyleovih

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kada čovjeka ubiju pred sinom, Danny i Maria nađu sumnjivca kojega štiti status svjedoka suradnika u drugoj istrazi

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Baez i Dannyju sumnjiva je majka jedne djevojčice. Njezina priča ne drži vodu pa slijedi istraga moguće otmice

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Baez pokušava saznati informacije o Dannyjevoj bivšoj djevojci, poznatoj dilerici droge. Jamie mora na ispitivanje kad zločinac kojega je gonio umre

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Pod iznimnim pritiskom zajednice gradonačelnik mora istražiti Frankov odjel nakon što je policajac primijenio pretjeranu silu na zločincu

programme.title: Samo ne Božić
Anything But Christmas
programme.desc: Samohrana majka Garce pronalazi ljubav u novom muškarcu, ali on ima samo jednu manu. Što će učiniti kad otkrije da on ne slavi Božić

programme.title: Beethovenova velika avantura
Beethoven's big break
programme.desc: Bila je beskućnica, a sada je zvijezda! Eddie (Jonathan Silverman) je samohrani otac i trener životinja. Njegov sin Billy (Moises Arias) žarko želi psića, no otac nije trenutno spreman sinu udovoljiti jer i ovako jedva spajaju kraj s krajem. U međuvremenu , Billy susreće Beethovena, psa lutalicu u potrazi za hranom. Ne može odoljeti psiću te ga dovodi kući. No Bethoveen je zapravo kuja koja će uskoro imati okot pa, iako nezadovoljan razvojem situacije, Eddie dozvoljava sinu da privremeno prisvoji bernardinku dok joj ne nađu novi dom. Kada pseća filmska zvijezda bude oteta, producentica (Rhea Perlman) i redatelj (Eddie Griffin), Beethovenu daju glavnu ulogu u filmu! „Beethovenova velika avantura“ zapravo je šesti dio obiteljskog filmskog serijala o velikom bernardincu i njegovim/njezinim avanturama. Uloge su podijeljene provjerenim glumcima - Jonatahanu Silvermanu, Jennifer Finnigan, Moisesu Ariasu, Eddieju Griffinu te Rhei Perlman, koje se sjećamo kao Carle iz kultnog “Kafića Uzdravlje”. Možda nastavak ne nudi ništa novo, no ukoliko ste uživali u prijašnjim nestašlucima velikog ljubimca, svidjet će vam se i ovaj posljednji dio o nezgrapnom bernardincu

programme.title: Umorstva u Midsomeru
Midsomer murders
programme.desc: Barnaby istražuje kad tijekom mađioničarske predstave vlasnicu puba zdrobi golema plastična kutija

programme.title: Tajna afera
Waking up in Reno
programme.desc: Upoznajte Roya (P. Swayze) i Candy (C. Theron) te Lonnie Earla (B.B. Thornton) i Darlene (N. Richardson), dva mlada bračna para koji misle kako se dobro poznaju sve dok ne odluče zajedno otići na izlet iz svojih snova. Kreću na put u posve novom nakrcanom sportskom vozila i zabavljaju se kao nikada u životu. Sve dok se ne dogodi nešto neobično na putu do spektakularnih utrka tegljača u Reno-u, Nevada. Čini se da je Lonnie Earl zaljubljen u Candy, a kada istina izbije na vidjelo, ovaj zabavni izlet doseže svoj vrhunac

programme.title: Odbjegla nevjesta
Runaway bride
programme.desc: Glas o Maggie Carpenter (J. Roberts), nevjesti koja je uspjela pobjeći s tri vjenčanja, dospio je i do omiljenoga kafića poznatoga newyorškoga kolumnista i umjerenoga ženomrsca Ikea Grahama (R. Gere). Nakon što novinar intrigantnu temu zajedljivo obradi u svojoj kolumni, povrijeđena djevojka prosvjeduje kod glavne urednice. Suočen s mogućnošću tužbe, popularni dnevnik otkazuje daljnju suradnju svojoj dojučerašnjoj zvijezdi. Ike odlazi u djevojčin gradić i pokušava otkriti nove pojedinosti koje bi mu dale za pravo i spasile unosno radno mjesto. Ubrzo se sprijateljuje s Maggienom obitelji i prijateljima, odnosno s cijelim mjestom koje potresa uzbuđenje zbog priprema za još jedno vjenčanje. Hoće li nevjesta ponovno pobjeći? Jasno da hoće, ali u sljedećemu pokušaju na red dolazi stanoviti revni pripadnik sedme sile. Lovac se uhvatio u stupicu koju je sam pripremao. Svadbeni marš zasvirat će i njemu... "Odbjegla nevjesta" uzorna je melodrama o privlačnoj djevojci čije ljubavi redom završavaju pred oltarom, ali ne i u braku, te velegradskom novinaru koji neočekivano pada sa svoga nedodirljivoga pijedestala. Snimljena je prema scenariju starih suradnica Josann MacGibbon i Sare Pariott (Worth Wining, The Favor), a u režiji Garryja Marshalla. I sam iskusni glumac (među inim i u TV serijalima Murphy Brown, Tri sestre, Monk, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch), producent (Grasshoper, Tko čuva dijete) i scenarist (The Flamingo Kid, Ljubav na američki način), Marshall je devet godina poslije "Zgodne žene", u kojoj je uz Juliju Roberts i Richarda Gerea i sam sudjelovao, odlučio pokušati ponoviti neočekivani uspjeh jedne od najvećih filmskih uspješnica s početka devedestih. Primijenivši prokušanu formulu, s dvoje privlačnih i popularnih protagonista u romantičnoj priči u kojoj se izmjenjuju humor i suze, nije mogao promašiti. "Odbjegla nevjesta" i danas funkcionira besprijekorno kao zabavan eskapistički predah

programme.desc: Ova epizoda bavi se vašim mozgom i grijehom. Poigrat ćemo se vašim mozgom kroz seriju igara i eksperimenata kako bismo vam pokazali da vaš mozak može biti predodređen za grijeh, i iako je grijeh loš, još važnije je da ima i svoju pozitivnu stranu

programme.title: Yukonsko zlato 3
programme.desc: Ken i Guillaume kreću u obećavajuću misiju u još udaljeniji Arizona Creek. Cam Johnson podiže uloge i postavlja cilj na 42,5 kilograma zlata u vrijednosti većoj od 2 milijuna dolara, ali ga dočeka katastrofalan početak na Stowe Creeku

programme.title: Američka brodogradilišta

programme.title: Je li to istina?
programme.desc: Ostatci nove ljudske vrste veličine hobita otkriveni su u Indoneziji, potvrđujući postojanje legendarnog Orang Pendeka ili "sićušnog čovjeka". Pridružite se ekspediciji u nadi za izradbom prve snimke Orang Pendeka

programme.title: Priče o olujama
programme.desc: Pratite priču krotitelja slonova i ribolovca na Tajlandu, koji je preživio jednu od najvećih prirodnih katastrofa u povijesti - ogroman tsunami iz prosinca 2004., koji je ubio više od 300000 i razorio domove milijunima drugih

programme.title: Licitiraj i uništi
programme.desc: Dečki nalaze važne sportske suvenire kad obavljaju teško rušenje na kući u Auburnu u New Hampshireu

programme.title: Priče o olujama

programme.title: Na ledu
programme.desc: Pratite fotografa Jamesa Baloga na Arktiku dok se koristi time-lapse kamerama kako bi snimio višegodišnje mijenjanje ledenjaka

programme.title: Čitači vremena
Time Scanners
programme.desc: Steve and the team head to the ancient city of Petra to find answers to ancient questions by using cutting-edge 3D laser-scanning technology

programme.title: Testirajte svoj mozak
Test Your Brain
programme.desc: The episode on 'attention' will be shot in the attention-demanding city of Las Vegas. Our guide for this episode's journey into the brain will be a master magician David Copperfield whose stock and trade is manipulating an audience's attention to produce amazing illusions. Magicians like David understand the psychology of the human mind as well as any lab scientist and we will find out how they use this knowledge of the brain to perform their tricks. And our scientific experts will draw on their insight into attention to create illusions rivaling those of the master magicians. Believe it or not, the bottleneck of attention that filters the flood if stimuli entering the brain is so limited, that a gorilla can walk through the room right in front of your eyes and you won't even see it…prepare to be amazed

programme.title: Majstor katastrofe
Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Disaster Specialist, Tim Samaras, attempts to adapt state of the art robotic technology to search for victims trapped inside a building collapse, in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse. Building collapses are common throughout the world, they can crumble without warning, and can take tens of thousands of lives in an instant. Whether caused by a tornado, earthquake, an act of terrorism or poor construction, the aftermath of a collapsed building can be just as deadly as the collapse itself. Unstable floors and walls pose hazardous threats to rescue workers and leave them with one option…risk their life to save another. But that may be about to change. Join Samaras and his team of engineers as they test and transform the latest surveillance technology into a search and rescue tool- that gives rescuers a look deep inside a collapsed building without stepping one foot inside in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: What would life on Earth be like if the planet were ravaged by bizarre and deadly weather phenomena? Could humanity endure a massive, never-ending super storm? This program examines what could happen if a terrible miscalculation initiated a runaway greenhouse effect on Earth upsetting environmental balance and sending us to the very brink of extinction. Experts in the fields of climatology, physics, geology and disaster anthropology come together to consider disasters including super tornadoes, gamma ray lightning, ball lightning, and a giant hurricane that consumes the globe. There may be hope for mankind if we can rise to the challenge and adapt to a new Earth we barely recognize

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr. Zeb Hogan teams up with kayaking expert Trip Jennings and a team of Brazilian scientists to tackle the Rio Roosevelt in western Brazil. They'll battle the river's deadly rapids in an effort to complete a comprehensive survey of one of the Amazon's most remote jungle rivers, and discover what monster fish are lurking beneath the surface of this 400 mile-long river. Pressures like logging and dams are believed to be destroying critical fish habitat throughout the region. His journey is an important look at what might be lost if these pressures reach the pristine Rio Roosevelt

programme.title: Čitači vremena
Time Scanners
programme.desc: Steve and the team head to the ancient city of Petra to find answers to ancient questions by using cutting-edge 3D laser-scanning technology

programme.title: Testirajte svoj mozak

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Riley buys a ticket and joins the crowd. A million commuters… scurrying to and from work… It's a typical day in the fifth largest mass transit system in the USA… and there's a train due somewhere every few seconds. Behind the scenes, the action is even more frantic as thousands of workers struggle to keep this huge system up and running 24/7. Transit controllers, operators, mechanics, electricians, communications experts… all working to monitor, co-ordinate and repair, the thousands of trains, buses, and trolleys that make up this incredibly complex transport matrix

programme.title: Zagonetni dosjei
Mystery Files
programme.desc: Arthur Legendary King of the Britons. From his castle at Camelot, Arthur and his knights in shining armour become the ultimate symbol of chivalry and honor. Its a fantastic story passed down through the ages. But did a King Arthur ever really exist? Piecing together clues buried in long lost ruins and fragments of surviving documents dating back 1500 years, Mystery Files investigates if a real King Arthur ever did exist

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography produces an epic yet intimate journey through America's deserts. Everything in the desert lives and dies at the mercy of water. Dry, inhospitable wilderness, they are among the harshest, most extreme environments on the planet. Wind and water sculpt these thirst-lands into natural monuments… as unique as they are spectacular. But look closer and the desert reveals a SECRET WORLD of INTRIGUE… surprising stories of survival, epic perseverance… and things you've never seen before. All of America's deserts provide something… a hidden bounty for those who know where to find it… and how to use it. Title Final Yes(c)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of the biggest and oldest of North America's river monsters: the White Sturgeon

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: They're fish that fly. They are carp from Asia now popping up in America's waterways like zombie attackers from a B-movie. They can jump 10 feet in the air at the sound of a boat motor, turning a day on the water into a boxing match. Bighead and silver carp were first imported into the U-S in the early 1970s. They soon escaped. Now they are in almost half the American states and are on the march toward Canada. Aquatic Ecologist Zeb Hogan is literally dodging flying fish as he tries to discover why these invaders are taking over and if there's anything we can do to stop them

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash

Ben and Frankie plump for the iconic London Taxi, whilst George and Sheldon go big with a Lincoln Town Car Limousine

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Discover a new age where machines talk to machines, sciences come together to form new disciplines, and new connections are made every day

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Riley buys a ticket and joins the crowd. A million commuters… scurrying to and from work… It's a typical day in the fifth largest mass transit system in the USA… and there's a train due somewhere every few seconds. Behind the scenes, the action is even more frantic as thousands of workers struggle to keep this huge system up and running 24/7. Transit controllers, operators, mechanics, electricians, communications experts… all working to monitor, co-ordinate and repair, the thousands of trains, buses, and trolleys that make up this incredibly complex transport matrix

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Remont Zemlje
Earth Overhaul
programme.desc: Sean Riley explores the work of gutsy, innovative scientists attempting the "world's toughest fix" yet: hacking Earth to drastically alter its climate and save the planet. In this hour, Riley will investigate four proposed geoengineering solutions to our climate change problem, starting with CGI depicting the devastating consequences these are designed to prevent. Then, in a "hands-on" section, Riley will go into the lab with the inventive scientist and engineers who've hatched these outlandish solutions

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Do amazing breakthroughs in technology bring terrifying new levels of danger to humanity? We this deadly question by exploring some of the dangers posed by one of the most promising new technologies: nano-robotics. This one-houir program postulates an environmental clean-up robot the size of a molecule, which is hacked by a rogue engineer and turned into a spreading, flesh-consuming monster. In this scenario, it becomes clear that the only technology fit to fight back against this nano-robot is another robot a near-microscopic nano-aircraft built by the American military. The nano-weapon does handle the initial threat but when it spins out of control and begins attacking cities around the world, the cure becomes more deadly and world-threatening than the disease. Only by resorting to an improvised weapon radar used to fuse and melt the tiny inner workings of these military robots does humanity escape this gruesome fate

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: A scientifically grounded look at the destructive power of the most important element in human survival: water. We explore the terrifying consequences that flash floods and rising sea levels could have on global populations, as experts explain how a massive volume of water might come to earth from space, and wreak havoc once it arrives. We examine several ways we could fight the rising tide: building immense seawalls to protect entire cities, underwater habitats, and finding new ways to live on the surface of the sea. As the ground begins to vanish beneath our feet, wed be forced to look at new ways to live on a planet that is becoming a water world but how long can we keep our heads above water? Is there hope for mankind to survive? Our ability to adapt may be our ultimate salvation

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Follow Dr Zeb Hogan, National Geographic Explorer and an aquatic biologist on his quest to find what could be the world's largest and most deadly freshwater fish - the giant freshwater stingray. We follow Zeb as he dives with a captive stingray for the very first time and hand feeds this monster of the deep

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of the biggest and oldest of North America's river monsters: the White Sturgeon

programme.title: Testirajte svoj mozak
Test Your Brain
programme.desc: The episode on 'attention' will be shot in the attention-demanding city of Las Vegas. Our guide for this episode's journey into the brain will be a master magician David Copperfield whose stock and trade is manipulating an audience's attention to produce amazing illusions. Magicians like David understand the psychology of the human mind as well as any lab scientist and we will find out how they use this knowledge of the brain to perform their tricks. And our scientific experts will draw on their insight into attention to create illusions rivaling those of the master magicians. Believe it or not, the bottleneck of attention that filters the flood if stimuli entering the brain is so limited, that a gorilla can walk through the room right in front of your eyes and you won't even see it…prepare to be amazed

programme.title: Remont Zemlje
Earth Overhaul
programme.desc: Sean Riley explores the work of gutsy, innovative scientists attempting the "world's toughest fix" yet: hacking Earth to drastically alter its climate and save the planet. In this hour, Riley will investigate four proposed geoengineering solutions to our climate change problem, starting with CGI depicting the devastating consequences these are designed to prevent. Then, in a "hands-on" section, Riley will go into the lab with the inventive scientist and engineers who've hatched these outlandish solutions

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Zagonetni dosjei
Mystery Files
programme.desc: On July 17th 1918, Russia's Tsar Nicholas II, his wife and five children, are reported to have been brutally executed. Then in 1991, a grave is uncovered but two of the children are missing raising the possibility of them surviving. In 2007, a second burial site is unearthed. Can its contents finally reveal the true story of what happened to the lost royal children? With unique access to previously unpublished secret reports on rescuing the Tsar's family and to leading forensic scientists striving to extract evidence from severely degraded bones

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: The shores of Scandinavia stretch for thousands of kilometers. Time and tide shape the land and the lives of the creatures that live here. It is a world of ceaseless change, in which animals live - literally - on the edge

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Romulus Whitaker travels four continents in search of the world's largest crocodiles, encountering gharials, saltwater and Nile crocodiles

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: To study big carnivores, researchers have to get close, very close. But how do you get within arm's length to some of the most dangerous predators on the planet who can easily take down prey that's five times your size? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr creates a protective suit that enables him to crawl alongside a Nile crocodile

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Classic ambush predators like crocs and snakes use camouflage and speed to capture their prey - sometimes faster than the blink of an eye. How do they do it? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr goes head-to-head with some of the most dangerous ambush predators on the planet. He'll trigger their strikes and film them on high-speed video

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Dr. Brady Barr has spent his life dealing with some of the most dangerous predators on earth, but this time he's way outside his comfort zone. We'll join him on an investigation deep into the Alaskan rainforest to track and study brown bears, then venture to the frozen shores of Canada's Hudson Bay to get an up close encounter with a polar bear

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: The shores of Scandinavia stretch for thousands of kilometers. Time and tide shape the land and the lives of the creatures that live here. It is a world of ceaseless change, in which animals live - literally - on the edge

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: The American West conjures images of wide-open spaces, endless blue skies, and the wildest creatures in North America. Such iconic animals as pumas, bison, rattlesnakes and eagles are central to the image of America - they put the "wild" into the Wild West! But as humans have settled the land, these animals have retreated

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao: Kanada
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In Alberta and BC, pipe trucks have rolled over and crews in both places race to open vital highways

programme.title: Majstor katastrofe
Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Disaster Specialist, Tim Samaras, attempts to adapt state of the art robotic technology to search for victims trapped inside a building collapse, in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse. Building collapses are common throughout the world, they can crumble without warning, and can take tens of thousands of lives in an instant. Whether caused by a tornado, earthquake, an act of terrorism or poor construction, the aftermath of a collapsed building can be just as deadly as the collapse itself. Unstable floors and walls pose hazardous threats to rescue workers and leave them with one option…risk their life to save another. But that may be about to change. Join Samaras and his team of engineers as they test and transform the latest surveillance technology into a search and rescue tool- that gives rescuers a look deep inside a collapsed building without stepping one foot inside in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: The shores of Scandinavia stretch for thousands of kilometers. Time and tide shape the land and the lives of the creatures that live here. It is a world of ceaseless change, in which animals live - literally - on the edge

programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: Kozmičko putovanje svemirskog teleskopa Hubble
Hubble's Cosmic Journey
programme.desc: Hubble was launched in April 1990 onboard Space Shuttle Discoveryh and marked one of humanitys biggest dreams; to place a telescope into space

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: What would life on Earth be like if the planet were ravaged by bizarre and deadly weather phenomena? Could humanity endure a massive, never-ending super storm? This program examines what could happen if a terrible miscalculation initiated a runaway greenhouse effect on Earth upsetting environmental balance and sending us to the very brink of extinction. Experts in the fields of climatology, physics, geology and disaster anthropology come together to consider disasters including super tornadoes, gamma ray lightning, ball lightning, and a giant hurricane that consumes the globe. There may be hope for mankind if we can rise to the challenge and adapt to a new Earth we barely recognize

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe

programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: A new male lion bursts onto the Gorongosa scene, and a cold war for lion dominance of the floodplain begins. Joyce Poole arrives back at the park with new questions about the mysterious behavior of Gorongosa's elephants. Bob joins the rangers on a night patrol of villages suffering from crop raiding bull elephants, and gets a taste of the danger crop raiding poses to people and elephants alike

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: World's Deadliest: Super Powers focuses on the fantastic. The creatures take everyday abilities to the extreme… and some have powers far removed from the usual. In the battle of life and death, these animals have a wild card… and they use it to the detriment of their foes

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is hitting the road and heading down to the Deep South in search of the truth behind the myth of giant catfish. In the swamps and bayous of the southern U.S. there are widely told stories of catfish the size of a car that can swallow a man whole. Zeb is going all in with a cast of characters only found in the Dirty South to see if there really is any truth to this epic urban legend

programme.title: Zemlja puma
programme.desc: Deep in the vast American West lies a high, lonely land called the Colorado Plateau. This Living Eden is a vast, wild area, home to an incredible array of creatures that instinctively embody the spirit of the West. From the elusive mountain lion to the resourceful coyote, only the strongest survive in Canyon Country

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The 72 Dangerous Animals line-up is shaping into an incredibly intimidating list. But a run-in with an unlikely threat this episode can have devastating consequences as this animal buzzes into the top ten

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The countdown is on… with more beasts to come all vying for the chance to make the grade a family of venomous reptiles look sure to slither their way to the top

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: Najubojitije životinje Australije
programme.desc: When it comes to deadly venomous creatures, size doesnt matter. Australia is home to the Irukandji Jellyfish, which is only the size of a thumb nail, and the paralysis tick, which can smaller than a millimeter. Both of can be deadly within 24 hours

programme.title: Najubojitije životinje Australije
programme.desc: Australia is a country of vast landscapes and raw beauty, and home to some of the most venomous and deadly predators in the world. Zac was excited for a morning surfing with his older brother and mate at a remote surf break in Western Australia. It was a gray, overcast day, but the last thing on the young surfers mind was sharks until… one took off his leg in a single bite

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: A deep trip into the wild to take fresh look at humankind's relationship to the big animals that live alongside us. From cuddling baby pandas to avoiding man-eating tigers, Dr. M. Sanjayan investigates how our relationships with wilderness is changing - the severe peril of extraordinary animals and their habitats is ever present, but what he focuses on are the powerful stories that prove animals and humans can thrive side by side

programme.title: Divlja Kanada
programme.desc: From the prairies to Canada's vast boreal forest that stretches almost from coast to coast, we reveal a huge wilderness of extremes that has been shaped over millennia by both humans and wildfires. Here pronghorn antelope, the fastest hoofed land animal on earth, still haunt the grasslands, the elusive wolverine thrives in the icy remote northern forests and beaver share their cozy lodges with grateful muskrats(c)

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the sea to the sky to the outback…Expect the unexpected from this bunch of Australia's most dangerous animals

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: From the African plains to the Arctic, and from Russia to America, this episode explores wild grasslands - home to the greatest gathering places of animal life on the planet, yet among the most endangered places on Earth

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: A journey deep into the great forests of planet Earth, reveals a new way of looking at these wild places and the animals that live there

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: Starting on the most pristine reef on Earth, seemingly home to more predators than prey, Dr. M. Sanjayan draws deep on his own ocean experiences to reveal a vibrant community who are providing solutions that can help restore the oceans

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: A deep trip into the wild to take fresh look at humankind's relationship to the big animals that live alongside us. From cuddling baby pandas to avoiding man-eating tigers, Dr. M. Sanjayan investigates how our relationships with wilderness is changing - the severe peril of extraordinary animals and their habitats is ever present, but what he focuses on are the powerful stories that prove animals and humans can thrive side by side

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
programme.desc: Water is vital for life-both humans and wildlife cannot survive without it. From the wilds of Africa to an undercover trip to Uzbekistan, and from the depths of the Grand Canyon to the cornfields of Missouri, this film explores how our use of water can either be destructive or beneficial for wildlife

programme.title: Divlja Indonezija
programme.desc: Borneo is the worlds third largest island, and Sumatra is no dwarf in comparison. Both islands became cut off from the Asian mainland when sea levels rose at the end of the last ice age 12,000 years ago. Large animals became marooned, isolated from their mainland cousins. Over time, they have adapted and evolved to their new home developing an array of unique traits on each island. Today, these are the Islands of Monsters

programme.title: Divlja Kolumbija
programme.desc: Spanning the western length of Colombia, the Chocó region is rich with biodiversity. It is the wettest place on earth and the only country in South America to be bathed by both the Pacific and Atlantic oceans. The rainforests, isolated by the Andes, host a habitat of unique, endemic and yet-to-be discovered species

programme.title: Divlja Kanada
programme.desc: From the prairies to Canada's vast boreal forest that stretches almost from coast to coast, we reveal a huge wilderness of extremes that has been shaped over millennia by both humans and wildfires. Here pronghorn antelope, the fastest hoofed land animal on earth, still haunt the grasslands, the elusive wolverine thrives in the icy remote northern forests and beaver share their cozy lodges with grateful muskrats

programme.title: Divlja Šri Lanka
programme.desc: Sri Lanka as a country contains astonishing biodiversity. But one environment on the island is a biodiversity hotspot - even richer and more complex than anywhere else. Many species unique to Sri Lanka live nowhere except its central highlands - in the cloud forests. It's a fast-vanishing habitat. The cool, high, damp conditions are perfect for growing tea

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: The Africa savannah crosses 25 countries and is home to millions of animals. Here herbivores and carnivores are caught in a constant struggle for survival. From the apex carnivore, the lion, to the humble meerkat, this film charts 24 hours of life here, through day, night and day again, revealing incredible behaviour driven by the evolutionary clock of time

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Across the endless plains of the Serengeti, the crisp white expanses of the Arctic and the windswept, breath-taking Tibetan Plateau, innovative techniques allow us to access remote habitats and capture rare animal behavior, without disrupting the animals daily struggle for survival

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Dense forests, vast tracts of mountains and rugged terrain these are the earths remote, isolated wild places. Life here is hard and recording it just as challenging. Finding and then getting close to the few, wary creatures of these special worlds has taken decades

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: The planets rivers, lakes and oceans are home to billions of earths most astonishing creatures. They haven’t always been the most accessible, but now we can go to places once out of reach to find everything from the giants of the oceans to the tiniest sea creatures, almost invisible to the naked eye

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: This film follows a group of animals over 24 hours living in and around one of the driest desert regions on Earth: the Atacama in northern Chile

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini: Tasmanija
programme.desc: From the forests to the waters, this is a snapshot of the extraordinary lives of Tasmania's animals over 24 hours. This land of unique creatures south of the Australian mainland has an extraordinary variety of strange and bizarre creatures

programme.title: Najubojitije životinje Australije
programme.desc: Australia's beautiful land and oceans is inhabited by some of the most venomous and deadly creatures. The jack jumper ant is native to Australia, and their venom is one of the most powerful in the insect world

programme.title: Najubojitije životinje Australije
programme.desc: Australia's vast landscapes and beautiful waters are home to some of the worlds most deadly creatures. On tonights episode Ron was excited to try out his brand new wetsuit in the surf one late afternoon. His father was watching from the car, uneasy about his son surfing in the overcast, drizzly conditions. Ron was about to catch a wave back to shore when he felt a shark tear at his leg

programme.title: Amazonija
programme.desc: Stealthy jaguars prowl, army ants swarm and tarantulas bring down rodent prey when seasonal flooding gives way to the dry season and millions of miles of rain forest habitat is revealed

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca 3
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond. From the big to the small, the fearsome to the furry, the world's most crazy cat contenders make for an adrenaline-fueled Animal Fight Club

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: At the roof of the world and on the edge of civilization sits the Russian Arctic, known for its extreme temperatures, weather and hostility

programme.title: Kraljevstvo oceana
programme.desc: Coral polyps are the tiny animals that have changed the geography of our planet. They construct underwater mountains to shelter an extraordinarily diverse group of species, of every color, every shape and every behavior. They even offer a peaceful lagoon for the mother whale and her newborn calf

programme.title: Amazonska električna riba
programme.desc: The Amazon has the highest diversity of life on the planet, but what lies below it is truly shocking. In its deep muddy rivers, a freak-show of fish life has exploded, with some of the strangest shapes and weirdest adaptations on Earth. Using electricity, these "Super" fish can communicate wirelessly, control each other remotely and emit shocks that can stop a human heart

programme.title: Amazonija
programme.desc: At more than 4,000 miles long, the worlds mightiest river -- the Amazon -- is an inland ocean, teeming with life

programme.title: Amazonija
programme.desc: The Amazon rushes, then recedes, as the rain forests terrestrial and aquatic realms battle for dominance

programme.title: Amazonija
programme.desc: Stealthy jaguars prowl, army ants swarm and tarantulas bring down rodent prey when seasonal flooding gives way to the dry season and millions of miles of rain forest habitat is revealed

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Symbols of courage and power, lions have been intensively researched for many decades. But certain things remained hidden. Thanks to thermal imaging cameras, this film reveals the last secrets of Africa's largest wild cats. We follow two prides and their respective females by day and by night, discovering astonishing behavioral patterns, many of which have never been seen before

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Lions, the rulers of the Savannah, are seen as being unbeatable as a pride. But even they have to fight every day for their lives. The pride located at the Ronkai River in the south of Kenya was able to ensure the safety of the majority of their offspring during the first dangerous months. But now, lean times face the animals: the huge wildebeest herds are now migrating south to the Serengeti

programme.title: Kraljevi koji nestaju
programme.desc: The story of 5 young lions that must conquer the Namib desert and establish their own kingdom in this place of constant danger, everlasting hunger and thirst, and inevitable suffering

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca 3

programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Igre velikih mačaka
programme.desc: THE BIG CAT GAMES is a high-end, high-profile television event that pits the world's most ferocious land predators against each other in a series of challenges that will push them to the limits of their athletic abilities

programme.title: Velike mačke: Čudesna obitelj
programme.desc: Patrick begins his quest with the oldest of the family's eight dynasties, the PANTHERA - the big cats. We travel to the jungles of Thailand to meet the oldest cat alive on the planet today, the mysterious CLOUDED LEOPARD. Getting up close and personal with this powerful predator Patrick discover the basic cat 'blue print' that has allowed all members of this family to thrive

programme.title: Velike mačke: Čudesna obitelj
programme.desc: Eight million years ago cats ventured into the Americas for the first time. To conquer this vast new super continent they split into three new dynasties - one conquering the snow, one the jungles and one the plains. Patrick begins his American adventure in the tangled jungles of Central America, where he meets the OCELOT dynasty

programme.title: Madagaskar

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Rat između Rygaarda i Oakesa kulminirao je nakon što je Kelly uništio Rygaardov kamionet. A u ekipi "Papaca" napetost između Coatsyja i Joea također doseže vrhunac kad Coatsy donese drastičnu odluku o Joeovom zaposlenju

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Marc vozi skupinu dvadesetogodišnjaka u New Orelans na Mardi Gras, ali put je sve prije nego lagan. Jarrett prevozi teret koji će ga dovesti u blizinu djevojke koja mu se sviđa, ali kad zakasni, uviđa da ljubav može skupo stajati

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Kad rani model jet-skija, "Wet Bike" iz 1970-ih, dođe u radionicu, klijent podiže uloge: Ricku i Ronu nudi novac ako uspiju voziti obnovljenu pilu, a da ne padnu

programme.title: Najbolje na četiri kotača
programme.desc: Nadahnuti naslijeđem borbenog mlažnjaka Saaba momci Saab '96 iz 1972. pretvaraju u vozilo koje izgleda kao da mu je više mjesto među oblacima nego na cesti

programme.title: Neustrašivi aljaški vozači
programme.desc: Ekipe zalaze sve dublje u unutrašnjost Aljaske, a teren je sve suroviji. "Ratnici" nailaze na staze na kojima ih očekuju oštre stijene, brze rijeke i strmi usponi, a svoja vozila "sile" do krajnjih granica

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Farma u Maineu otkriva šest generacija tajni, a legenda NASCAR-a Ryan Newman dokazuje da je, kad je riječ o pregovaranju, opasan kao Danielle(c)

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Shelby je opet vratio svoj gliser, i to s motorom od 500 konjskih snaga, koji će mu pomoći da obavi posao. Rygaard se muči, a Gabe je primoran promaknuti neiskusnu ekipu, što bi moglo imati katastrofalne posljedice

programme.title: Lovci na kamione

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: "Holdensi" i "Big Texansi" dolaze pomoći u potrazi za nestalim kamionom koji je prevozio hranu u "Banku hrane" u Houstonu. Budući da bi tom konzerviranom hranom prehranjivali 1500 obitelji cijeli mjesec, pronalazak kamiona glavni im je prioritet

programme.title: U potrazi za Hitlerom

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Oni koji obilaze dražbe skladišnih odjeljaka uvijek mogu pronaći dvije stvari u luci Long Beach: skupe uvozne stvari ili jeftini namještaj. No pravo je pitanje u kojem se odjeljku skrivaju? Dave i Darell odlučili su se za skladište puno rekvizita za rodeo i surferskih stvari, te sredstva za čišćenje, a Jarrod i Brandi bore se za odjeljak s raznim predmetima kojima bi mogli napuniti svoj dućan rabljene robe
programme.category: dokumentarni reality, All Guns to Port

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Sljedeća se dražba odvija u Homelandu, gdje će naši protagonisti pokušati kupiti skladišta za što manje novca. Darrell će se 'kockati' za skladišni odjeljak s namještajem, dok Jarrod igra na sigurno. Koji će od njih pronaći zlato, a koji smeće

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kad se u kalifornijskom gradu španjolsko-američke baštine obiju lokoti na skladišnim spremnicima, naši neustrašivi kupci otkrit će nekoliko zanimljivih i unikatnih primjeraka, poput neobičnog telefona, starinskog kotla za kućnu izradu alkoholnog pića, ali i interesantnu uredsku opremu. Na prvi pogled pronađene stvarčice ne izgledaju bog zna što, no naše protagonite zanima samo novac. Vrijede li one više od uloženog
programme.category: dokumentarni reality, The Old Spanish Standoff

programme.title: Bitka za skladište

programme.sub-title: Midnight in the Gardena Good and Evil
programme.desc: Upoznajte jezivu stranu napuštenih skladišta! Danas se prodaju skladišta u Gardeni. Kako bi doznao u kojem se skladištu krije 'zgoditak', Barry uposli dvoje vidovnjaka koji niti u jednom od njih neće osjetiti dobru vibru. No to neće uplašiti Jarroda i Brandi koji će riskirati sve kako bi oplemenili svoj dućan nekim novim stvarima

The Ascent of Civilisation
programme.desc: Ova epizoda otkriva da je mit o lošoj reputaciji Vikinga kao divljih ubojica lažan i pripovijeda priču o tolerantnom narodu s organiziranom trgovačkom mrežom koja je prolazila kroz Europu

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Tony i njegov tim pomažu karizmatičnom Hektoru Rousu da razjasni tajanstvenu povijest ladanjske kuće obitelji Tudor u Suffolku

programme.title: Slavna putovanja europskim željeznicama
Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Dok Michael Portillo slijedi dio putnog plana koji predlaže Bradshawov vodič, istražuje nevjerojatnu arhitekturu nove umjetnosti u češkom glavnom gradu Pragu

programme.title: Vrijeme koje je promijenilo svijet
Weather that Changed the World
programme.desc: U dva navrata, 1812. i 1941., izgledalo je da Rusija kleči pred ratnim neprijateljem, kada joj je u pomoć priskočio neočekivani saveznik, teško zimsko nevrijeme(c)

programme.title: II. svjetski rat: cijena Carstva
World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.desc: Njemačka želi neutralizirati britanske snage iz zraka u Bici za Britaniju. Luftwaffe je odbijen, ali počinje Blitz. Nijemci kreću u Sjevernu Afriku podržati svoje saveznike. (S1, Ep4)

programme.title: Karpov - Kasparov, dva kralja i jedna kruna
Karpov, Kasparov, Two Kings for a Crown
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o 25-godišnjem suparništvu između dva šahovska diva, Anatolija Karpova i Garryja Kasparova koji su vodili osobni rat u svijetu koji se razrušio

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Jamie izlazi iz okvira prihvaćenih pravovjerja i uvjerenja te nas u ovoj epizodi vodi u podzemlje kako bi istražio nevjerojatnu povijest Sotonske crkve

programme.title: Elizabeta protiv terora
Elizabeth I, War on Terror
programme.desc: Nevjerojatni dokumentarac otkriva znamenite događaje iz 1586. kad je najznačajniji engleski špijun u razdoblju od osam tjedana uveo nove špijunske tehnike kako bi spriječio atentat na Elizabetu I

programme.title: Otkriveni Ermitaž
Hermitage Revealed
programme.desc: Dokumentarac vodi publiku na uzbudljivo putovanje kroz povijest muzeja, od carske palače do državnoga muzeja. Pruža pristup dosad neviđenim zbirkama i ekskluzivnim područjima. Državni muzej Ermitaž u St. Peterburgu jedan je od najstarijih i najvećih muzeja na svijetu. Dom je za više od 3 milijuna artefakata i ima više kustosa nego bilo koja umjetnička ustanova. Emisija vodi publiku na uzbudljivo putovanje kroz povijest muzeja, od carske palače do državnoga muzeja. Pruža do sad neviđeni pristup posebnim zbirkama i ekskluzivnim područjima koja su skrivena od oka javnosti. Od Rembrandta do ruskih remek-djela, od prapovijesnih artefakata do privatne zbirke dragulja Katarine Velike, od Michelangela do Matissea i još puno toga, Ermitaž nudi naizgled neiscrpnu riznicu nevjerojatnih blaga

programme.title: Posljednji dani Anne Boleyn
The Last Days of Anne Boleyn
programme.desc: Priča o iznenadnom i nasilnom padu Anne Boleyn obuzela je i žestoko podijelila povjesničare. Emisija istražuje tko je Anne uistinu bila i zašto je ona prva pogubljena kraljica

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Godine 1996. arheolog Steven Collins krenuo je na misiju da pronađe Sodomu. Na jordanskim ravnicama otkrio je nevjerojatne ruševine nepoznatoga grada koji je naizgled uništila vatrena apokalipsa

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Mojsijev štap prouzročio je neka od najnevjerojatnijih biblijskih čuda. Povijesni detektiv Graham Phillips pokušava pronaći štap

programme.title: Vrijeme koje je promijenilo svijet
Weather that Changed the World
programme.desc: Kuga u Europi prvi se put pojavila 541. godine. Ali kako se tako ravnomjerno proširila? Je li krivac "nestalo" sunce? Ako jest, zašto je sunce "nestalo"
